info.title: Aadhar Card Status
info.description: Check the status of the UIDAI's Aadhar Card by just providing your UIDAI Aadhar card enrollment ID and time of enrollment.

get.description: Call this endpoint to get a unique token for the call to check status of the the aadhar.
Get the status of the aadhar card using this end point.

parameters.name: captchaValue
parameters.description: Captcha value for the image that you got by calling get token endpoint.

parameters.name: eid
parameters.description: Enrollment id of the aadhar card.

parameters.name: etimestamp
parameters.description: Enrollment date and time of the aadhar card.

parameters.name: secretKey
parameters.description: The secret key that you got by calling get token endpoint.
